(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT Every) (NN time) (NN I))
    (VP
      (VP (VBP come)
        (NP (NN home))
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP (DT a) (NN fishing) (NN trip))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (NN show)
        (PRT (RP off))
        (NP (PRP$ my) (NN catch))))
    (, ,)))


det(I-3, Every-1)
nn(I-3, time-2)
nsubj(come-4, I-3)
root(ROOT-0, come-4)
dobj(come-4, home-5)
prep(come-4, from-6)
det(trip-9, a-7)
nn(trip-9, fishing-8)
pobj(from-6, trip-9)
cc(come-4, and-10)
conj(come-4, show-11)
prt(show-11, off-12)
poss(catch-14, my-13)
dobj(show-11, catch-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS kids))
    (VP (MD would)
      (ADVP (RB always))
      (VP (VB ask)
        (NP (PRP me))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB when))
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP am)
              (VP (VBG going)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB bring)
                      (NP (PRP them))
                      (PP (NN fishing)))))))))))
    (. .)))


poss(kids-2, my-1)
nsubj(ask-5, kids-2)
aux(ask-5, would-3)
advmod(ask-5, always-4)
root(ROOT-0, ask-5)
dobj(ask-5, me-6)
advmod(going-10, when-7)
nsubj(going-10, I-8)
aux(going-10, am-9)
advcl(ask-5, going-10)
aux(bring-12, to-11)
xcomp(going-10, bring-12)
dobj(bring-12, them-13)
prep(bring-12, fishing-14)

    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB usually))
    (VP (VBP go)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a)
          (ADJP (IN on))
          (NN boat))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS days)))))
    (, ,)))

    (NP (PRP it))

(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN As)
      (NP (JJ such)))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG looking)
          (PRT (RP around))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN place)))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB bring)
                (NP (DT the) (NN family) (NN fishing))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ My) (NN wife))
    (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
      (ADJP (RB too) (JJ keen)
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (NN fishing))))
      (SBAR (IN so)
        (S
          (NP (DT this) (NN place))
          (VP (MD must)
            (ADVP (RB also))
            (VP (VB have)
              (NP
                (NP (JJ other) (NNS activities))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (PRP her))))
              (ADVP (RB as) (RB well)))))))
    (. .)))

            (SBAR
              (WHADJP (RB exactly) (WP what))
              (S
                (NP (PRP I))

                  (VP (VBG looking)
                    (PP (IN for))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (SBAR
      (WHNP (WDT which))
      (S
        (VP (VBZ is)
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN size))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT a) (NN football) (NN field))))))))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (NP
        (NP
          (QP (RB around) (CD 6000))
          (JJ giant) (NN catfish))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (PRP it)))))
    (. .)))

csubj(has-10, is-2)
prep(is-2, about-3)
det(size-5, the-4)
pobj(about-3, size-5)
prep(size-5, of-6)
det(field-9, a-7)
nn(field-9, football-8)
pobj(of-6, field-9)
root(ROOT-0, has-10)
quantmod(6000-12, around-11)
num(catfish-14, 6000-12)
amod(catfish-14, giant-13)
dobj(has-10, catfish-14)
prep(catfish-14, in-15)
pobj(in-15, it-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBZ means)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
            (VP (VB have)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB wait)
                    (ADVP
                      (ADVP (RB too) (RB long))
                      (SBAR (IN before)
                        (S
                          (NP (DT the) (NN fish))
                          (VP (VBZ bites)))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP It))
      (VP (VBD took)
        (NP
          (QP (RB only) (CD 5))
          (NNS minutes))
        (SBAR (IN before)
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBD got)
              (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ first) (NN bite)))))))

    (S
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (VBD had)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB fight)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN catfish))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP
                    (QP (RB about) (CD 15))
                    (NNS mins)))))))))

      (S
        (NP (PRP it))
        (VP (VBD got)
          (ADJP (JJ tired)))))

    (S
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (VBD got)
        (S
          (NP (PRP him))
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB pose)
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (DT a) (NN photo))))))))
    (. .)))

      (PP (IN per)

          (PP (IN per)
            (NP (NN rod)))))
      (ADVP (RB regardless)
        (PP (IN of)
          (SBAR
            (WHADJP (WRB how) (JJ many))
            (S
              (NP (NNS people))
              (VP (VBP are)
                (VP (VBG fishing))))))))
    (. .)))

dep(fishing-14, many-11)
nsubj(fishing-14, people-12)
aux(fishing-14, are-13)
pcomp(of-9, fishing-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN For)
      (NP (PRP$ our) (NN family)))
    (NP (PRP we))
    (ADVP (RB only))
    (VP (VBD paid)
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (CD one) (NN fishing) (NN session))
          (CC and)
          (NP (CD one) (NN rod))))
      (SBAR (IN because)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP get)
            (ADJP (RB really) (JJ tired)
              (PP (IN after)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG fighting)
                    (NP (DT a) (NN fish))))))))))
    (. .)))


prep(paid-6, For-1)
poss(family-3, our-2)
pobj(For-1, family-3)
nsubj(paid-6, we-4)
advmod(paid-6, only-5)
root(ROOT-0, paid-6)
prep(paid-6, for-7)
num(session-10, one-8)
nn(session-10, fishing-9)
pobj(for-7, session-10)
cc(session-10, and-11)
num(rod-13, one-12)
conj(session-10, rod-13)
mark(tired-18, because-14)
nsubj(tired-18, you-15)
dep(tired-18, get-16)
advmod(tired-18, really-17)
advcl(paid-6, tired-18)
prep(tired-18, after-19)
pcomp(after-19, fighting-20)
det(fish-22, a-21)
dobj(fighting-20, fish-22)

            (NP (DT the) (NN day))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VBD picked)
                  (NP (PRP us))
                  (PRT (RP up))

        (S
          (NP
            (NP (JJ excellent) (NNP English))
            (CC and)
            (NP (PRP$ his) (NNP Pajero)))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (ADJP
              (NP
                (QP (RB only) (CD 3))
                (NNS months))
              (JJ old))))))
    (. .)))
